title: [K-12] Learner-Centered MOOC Design and Improvement Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory knowledge and online learning experience
context.additional_context: MOOC design competency enhancement program linked to social studies subjects for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Explain at least three inquiry-based MOOC content design frameworks that enhance learner engagement.
Apply at least two technology-enhancement strategies feasible in limited-tech environments (smartphone-centric).
Develop a MOOC effectiveness evaluation plan utilizing evidence-based strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
